story.title: #MuseumOfTheFuture – second debate
story.description: The second #MuseumOfTheFuture debate 'Changing public dialogues with museum collections in the digital age' took place on Thursday 16 October

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

quote.text: Very well behaved a audience @britishmuseum #museumofthefuture. Immediate silence as the panel sat down. #anticipation

user.description: So ‘somaro’ means dunce. Yep. Best to google before choosing. I apply my 'somaroness' to the museum world and other arts-related projects.
user.name: Sophie Smith

meta.text: Very well behaved a audience @britishmuseum #museumofthefuture. Immediate silence as the panel sat down. #anticipation

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. #8mummies http://t.co/P9VkYJxslo #Ming50Years http://t.co/KErWhltSGy #MemoriesOfANation http://t.co/e2xBN0lXJu
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: David Chipperfield: as an architect one has to believe in the physical of the real #MuseumOfTheFuture

quote.text: #MuseumOfTheFuture Digital democratises knowledge - let's utalise that. Make museum content more sharable.

user.description: Marketer @SpecialistWorks ‘Very important’ – Sir Antony Gormley. Museum enthusiast. Food historian. Questioning feminist. Hat lover. Known ginger.
user.name: Imogen Steinberg

meta.text: #MuseumOfTheFuture Digital democratises knowledge - let's utalise that. Make museum content more sharable.

quote.text: Please please please don't buzzfeedify the British museum. #MuseumOfTheFuture

user.description: London based video game artist creating detailed architectural drawings in my free time. Also flying a quadcopter for heritage and photogrammetry fun.
user.name: David Fletcher

meta.text: Please please please don't buzzfeedify the British museum. #MuseumOfTheFuture

quote.text: #MuseumOfTheFuture what should museums be collecting now for future generations?

user.description: Anthropologist, heritage junkie and london lover. Most likely to be found staring at old churches, bits of stone and ruins.
user.name: Hannah Brown

meta.text: #MuseumOfTheFuture what should museums be collecting now for future generations?

quote.text: Definitely! But do make content more shareable! "@artfletch: Please please please don't buzzfeedify the British museum. #MuseumOfTheFuture”

user.description: Global head of: Digital (at Precedent). Writing a book about: Digital transformation. Lover of: Art and craft beer. http://t.co/lmb0C7jyai
user.name: Lindsay Herbert

meta.text: Definitely! But do make content more shareable! "@artfletch: Please please please don't buzzfeedify the British museum. #MuseumOfTheFuture”

quote.text: @artfletch @britishmuseum Alternatively: do!

user.description: sexual being / book lover / banned from waterstones
user.name: Steve Spicer

meta.text: @artfletch @britishmuseum Alternatively: do!

quote.text: Lots of ideas being discussed at #MuseumOfTheFuture could be achieved by making more collections available as open data @britishmuseum

user.description: Senior Programme Manager for Open Data Challenge Series at @nesta_uk. Also south londoner. Views my own. @odchallenges
user.name: Ed Parkes

meta.text: Lots of ideas being discussed at #MuseumOfTheFuture could be achieved by making more collections available as open data @britishmuseum

quote.text: My favourite idea so far linking objects across museums, their original locations and info (also academic research!) #MuseumOfTheFuture

user.description: Head of Higher Education at the British Library, tweeting in personal capacity
user.name: Maja Maricevic

meta.text: My favourite idea so far linking objects across museums, their original locations and info (also academic research!) #MuseumOfTheFuture

quote.text: @edtparkes @britishmuseum and the entire output of @micropasts is open data

user.description: British Museum & Portable Antiquities (@findsorguk | @micropasts) ICT advisor, Hon. UCL lecturer. FSA. FRGS. WebSci, scuba, rugby, geo, archaeology, museums.
user.name: Daniel Pett

meta.text: @edtparkes @britishmuseum and the entire output of @micropasts is open data

quote.text: Mark Walport: #MuseumOfTheFuture is the opportunity to share things with other museums, exhibitions – democratising beautiful things

user.name: British Museum

meta.text: Mark Walport: #MuseumOfTheFuture is the opportunity to share things with other museums, exhibitions – democratising beautiful things

quote.text: Viewing objects 'physically' and 'virtually' aren't competing but complementing each other #MuseumOfTheFuture @britishmuseum @googleart

user.description: European Identity @LSEEI, Museum Cultures @birkbeck_arts. The place of art in society: cultural heritage, museums, and cultural policy. Views own.
user.name: Laura Kugel

meta.text: Viewing objects 'physically' and 'virtually' aren't competing but complementing each other #MuseumOfTheFuture @britishmuseum @googleart

quote.text: @googleart "the present is being collected right now on the internet- the role of the Museum is to engage with it" #MuseumOfTheFuture

user.description: Europe’s leading exhibition design group, we explore new and engaging approaches to interpreting and presenting content. Tweets by roving Eventers.
user.name: Event Communications

meta.text: @googleart "the present is being collected right now on the internet- the role of the Museum is to engage with it" #MuseumOfTheFuture

quote.text: Diff between collecting objects of the present & collecting digitally. But then so much of our lives are lived online... #museumofthefuture

user.description: So ‘somaro’ means dunce. Yep. Best to google before choosing. I apply my 'somaroness' to the museum world and other arts-related projects.
user.name: Sophie Smith

meta.text: Diff between collecting objects of the present & collecting digitally. But then so much of our lives are lived online... #museumofthefuture

quote.text: David Chipperfield: it's so important to have easy access but there's a struggle between objects' beauty and information #MuseumOfTheFuture

meta.text: David Chipperfield: it's so important to have easy access but there's a struggle between objects' beauty and information #MuseumOfTheFuture
